comments:
Every time I close any jsp page I get an error pop-up and a stacktrace in the .log file. This only happens for the sparc solaris-motif flavour of eclipse but I get it with both the 3.1 and the 3.2 milestone 
web tools 0.7.1 installed via eclipse-update
jsp page is saved ok so its an annoyance rather than a show-stopper
